snippet: The Justice Department says recent changes mean federal authorities are no longer violating a ban on holding immigrant children in secure facilities.
abstract: Justice Dept asks Federal Judge Dolly M Gee to reconsider order to immediately release mothers and children caught illegally entering United States from Mexico, saying they have addressed policies that violated ban on holding immigrant children for prolonged periods of time.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department says recent changes mean federal authorities are no longer violating a ban on holding immigrant children in secure facilities.

headline.main: California: Judge Asked to Rescind Release of Immigrant Detainees
headline.print_headline: California: Judge Asked to Rescind Release of Immigrant Detainees
